he

I are not be able to

raw: I shall write you again about too late to go do do yet. Iam conta a son Gudan cor he cermg. I are not be able to before the 26 iust aśm mid-year finals wil begin this Hunddan ? I shall ger tunga on tu tote and shall write you about that time as to my I have made an appintment wit hirs. Lende to spend a week end wit m I 26 and entertainment in Wellesley elesley was a great succes I shall hope to anregea date wi' abbott acad for a similar entertainm pagune fer it benefit 'fland relies 4 jomiale I l al arrange to live ter i eademy bay go den to Abbatt chas quing me a bigger audience I share like to talk itüs over wt yan when I come, a plan to hele tis eulertainment to Middle y February at itu latest I neve me on expecta a peno, I shall fulfil that apponton in sure I eau lul tae

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter in which Kwan states that he will see Mrs. Lynde on the 26th, notes that the Wellesley celebration was a success and he would like to offer a similar event at Phillips Academy, including Abbot students. The Chinese New Year celebration for Boston Chinese students will be hosted by Prof. Norton A. Kent. News about the Chinese War Mission speakers: Dr. Koo gave a good speech.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
